official_title: A resolution to authorize Pamela Turner, an employee in the office of Senator Tower, Diane Nerheim, an employee in the office of Senator Fannin, and Jane Harty, an employee of the Joint Economic Committee, all former employees of former Senator Gurney, to appear as witnesses in the case of United States v. Gurney, et al.

summary.text: Authorizes Pamela Turner, an employee in the office of Senator Tower, Diane Nerheim, an employee in the office of Senator Fannin, and Jane Harty, an employee of the Joint Economic Committee, all former employees of former Senator Gurney, to appear as witnesses in the case of United States v. Gurney, et. al.

titles.title: A resolution to authorize Pamela Turner, an employee in the office of Senator Tower, Diane Nerheim, an employee in the office of Senator Fannin, and Jane Harty, an employee of the Joint Economic Committee, all former employees of former Senator Gurney, to appear as witnesses in the case of United States v. Gurney, et al.
